original_text: The hangings for one side of the gate were fifteen cubits, with their three pillars and three bases.
korean_text: 문 이쪽의 포장이 열다섯 규빗이요 그 기둥이 셋이요 받침이 셋이며

sentences.original_text: The hangings for one side of the gate were fifteen cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 문의 한쪽 휘장은 길이가 십오 규빗이었으며

sentences.original_text: with their three pillars and three bases.
sentences.korean_translation: 기둥 세 개와 받침대 세 개를 가졌다
